job.title: Senior Data Engineer, Consumer Growth
job.description: stronguAbout The TeambrbrustrongOur data engineering team is responsible for building the data processing and reporting infrastructure that powers companywide insights and operational intelligence By designing and implementing scalable data pipelines data warehouses and reporting platforms the data engineering team serves as the foundation for decisionmaking at DoorDashbrbrstronguAbout The RolebrbrustrongDoorDash is looking for a Senior Data Engineer with a passion for solving complex problems and a background in marketing or consumerdriven applications of data or other relevant experience The ideal candidate demonstrates proficiency in manipulating large datasets to act as a technical powerhouse when scaling databases dashboards tools reports and modelsbrbrThis role will work closely with Marketing and Consumer Growth teams to develop a detailed understanding of how our customers engage with our products and services as well as other marketing and promotional channels We are looking for a candidate who will be responsible for creating the data foundations that underpin internal tools such as CRM experimentation audiences and other intelligence platformsbrbrstronguYoure Excited About This Opportunity Because You WillbrustrongulliWork alongside worldclass data science and machine learning teamsliliTake ownership endtoend from defining the data architecture to implementing data models pipelines monitoring and quality assurance frameworksliliUnify data from multiple data sources using SQL Python and other languages to unlock business insightsliliManage a portfolio of pipelines and data marts that empower analysts and data scientists across the companyliliDocument new and existing models solutions and implementationsliliEnsure that processed data meets our high quality standardsliliContinuously improve and optimize our jobs to hit performance targetsbrliulstronguWere Excited About You Because You HavebrustrongulliHave prior experience working with marketing andor consumerdriven applications of data such as web amp mobile event processing consumer profiling attribution modeling or marketing automationlili5 years experience working in data engineering business intelligence or a similar roleliliExpert in SQL and optimizing complex queriesliliProficient in programming in PythonliliExperience working with Snowflake Redshift PostgreSQL andor other DBMS platformsliliExperience with data generated by proprietary software systems and industry SaaS solutions SFDC and Segment a plusliliExposure to andor development experience with open source frameworks such as Apache PySpark Druid message queue and streaming technologiesliliExcellent communication skills and experience working with business and data science teams to assess their data needsbrliulstrongWhy Youll Love Working at DoorDashbrstrongulliWe are leaders  Leadership is not limited to our management team Its something everyone at DoorDash embraces and embodiesliliWe are doers  We believe the only way to predict the future is to build it Creating solutions to lead our company and our industry is what we do  on every project every dayliliWe are learners  Were not afraid to dig in and uncover the truth even if its scary or inconvenient Everyone here is continually learning on the job no matter if weve been in a role for one year or one minuteliliWe are customerobsessed  Our mission is to grow and empower local economies We are committed to our customers merchants and dashers and believe in connecting people with possibilityliliWe are all DoorDash  The magic of DoorDash is our people together making our inspiring goals attainable and driving us to greater heightsliliWe offer great compensation packages and comprehensive health benefitsbrliulstronguAbout DoorDashbrbrustrongDoorDash is a technology company that connects customers with their favorite local and national businesses in over 4000 cities and all 50 states across the United States and Canada Founded in 2013 DoorDash empowers merchants to grow their businesses by offering ondemand delivery datadriven insights and better instore efficiency providing delightful experiences from door to door By building the lastmile delivery infrastructure for local cities DoorDash is bringing communities closer one doorstep at a time Read more on the strongDoorDash engineering blogstrong or at wwwdoordashcom
